showScoreExcerpt: “This new ‘Spamalot’ arrives, beefed up, gussied up and yes, even funnier than in its birthing engagement earlier this year...the revival of the Tony-winning musical by Python great Eric Idle, with John Du Prez, brings joy to a land desperately short of guffaws and chuckles and snickers and giggles.”
